existing_features.title: Download the image from the URL https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4D03AQG_vKIcM3o7oQ/profile-displayphoto-scale_400_400/B4DZw8fRO0HwAg-/0/1770541359476?e=1773878400&v=beta&t=hNLsHkQFnEh-Boegm1kbBhX7F8u1P42PUa-DT2DJzkk and save it as a static asset (frontend/public/assets/generated/profile-photo.png), then update the HeroSection component to use this local asset as the profile picture image source instead of any existing placeholder or external URL.

projectName: Set LinkedIn photo as profile picture in Hero section
